Bio

I hail from Stockholm, started my career in Edinburgh and currently living in London San Diego. For over a decade Iâ€™ve been working at the intersection of technology, media, and commerce. These days, I use AI-enabled applications to empower brands with personalized customer experiences at scale. My data-driven approach to marketing has created success for hundreds of startups, Fortune 500s, and solopreneurs.
